website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a very moisturizing cream with clean ingredients, this is a great option.
pros: Features colloidal oatmeal, shea butter, and ceramide 3 to moisturize and improve skin
Helps minimize the look of fine lines and wrinkles
Can be used on hands and body as well
cons: Contains eucalyptus oil, which can irritate some sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cream
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cream. I typically purchase cream and use it for a while then switch to another without using all of it. I have now bought 2 of these and use every drop. It's not greasy and I think it's helping clear up the little bumps on the back of my arms. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is pricey for lotion but oh so worth it. I apply it to my hands and feet every night. The scent is amazing and it is my daily beauty indulgence that actually moisturizes my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Not greasy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Not greasy, nice scent. Helps reduce elbow excema! !! Woohoo! Also perfect for my 60 year old face and neck in need of care to stay smooth and look fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Just 4 today

customer_reviews.title: Ultra repair cream
customer_reviews.text: The best body skin product out there. I use it every time I take a shower. It totally eliminates itchy skin and moisturizes your skin even in the winter. I know it is expensive but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Vah6

customer_reviews.title: THE Best
customer_reviews.text: This repair cream is the best I have ever used. It is not greasy, but absorbs well. A little bit is sufficient. Rosemary/mint is my favorite. The scent is not overwhelming, just very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cousin gave me this product last Christmas and I became addicted to it! I tracked down this large size on Amazon. It really works well on my elbows and arms generally. Faint, pleasant odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great to use on your entire body!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it literally everywhere- from my face, to my feet. I have very sensitive skin and it's non-irritating. I also am prone to breakouts- no problems with this cream. My skin is very dry, so I need something moisturizing, but not too heavy. This absorbs really well.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: I was sent defective product that made a mess!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that someone broke the lid on the jar of product and then tried to send it that way instead of giving me another, intact jar. They attempted to keep the broken jar lid on with additional packaging but they obviously didn’t consider handling and pressure changes. Product was everywhere and a complete mess. We lost half the jar of expensive cream. Soooo, I’m not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelh691

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin...I’ve been using this product for years now. Helps more than any other body moisturizer. A bit pricey but for me worth the price. I apply immediately after showering.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything but the fragrance...it needs improvement!! Honeysuckle smells good but it wasn't available when I bought the second jar which was jazmine!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Malone

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is not only ultra hydrating, it absorbs quickly into the skin. I have tried many other similar products that work well but take at least 30 minutes to absorb into the skin to no longer leave a "sticky" feeling on my hands and arms. The absorption rate for this cream is 2-3 minutes, tops. I have already recommended this cream to two other friends and will continue to recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, nourishing product that can shut down the itching of atopic dermatitis.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly creamy product that not only nourishes my skin but also shuts down some awful itching episodes. Unfortunately, my husband loves it too, so it was time to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth in Columbus

customer_reviews.title: Product good - shipping box too small
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. Package not. Too small for product. Laid sideways in box but still too tall for box causing a small chip on the plastic jar bottom edge from impact causing the leak of product in box as shown in picture. Not returning product because not too much lost and taped up leak spot so can still be used.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Dobe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was not the cream that it says it is. They put some other lotion in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wittenbraker

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: works great, but if you have extreme eczema you can easily go through this in a week. If price is no object, this is a perfect product
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Works on Eczema
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much and it also works wonders on my son’s eczema when it flairs up in the crease of his arm where it bends. Put it on there at the first sign of a Dalit up and it is gone in a few days. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Rubalcava

customer_reviews.title: Cream for dry shin
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cream I have found for my grandson. He has very dry, itchy skin. After using it 2 times we could see a great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Robertson

customer_reviews.title: First aid ultra beauty good for eczema
customer_reviews.text: Works great for eczema better than anything I've found in store
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, goes on easily, absorbs quickly and is not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Denzil

customer_reviews.title: Winter weather negator!
customer_reviews.text: True first aid for dry winter skin. I use it on my face and body. No scent, not greasy, sinks in nicely and 'voila', I am not itchy or scratchy!
customer_reviews.author: irened

customer_reviews.title: great skin product
customer_reviews.text: My Dr recommended this product. It is a great value--but more importantly works!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Housewife1

customer_reviews.title: NO HELP
customer_reviews.text: This product is pricey, but it did not improve the condition of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira V Daza

customer_reviews.title: Moisture
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase of this product. The cream is non greasy, no strong smell. Very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: EQ

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Great product but sadly the eucalyptus oil is too overpowering. It burns when I put it on my face and causes redness. Will not repurchase but I recommend it for those without sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sidra

customer_reviews.title: Light but complete coverage
customer_reviews.text: Use this right out of the shower. Has made a huge difference on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: LSparks

customer_reviews.title: The  cream moisturizes sensitive dry skin well.
customer_reviews.text: I use it year round since I have sensitive dry skin, and I am sensitive to smells. The cream works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! I have sensitive skin & sometimes eczema wants to try to come out...this is my helper if I feel an eczema spot may break out....this is my stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenster

customer_reviews.title: This is the one face lotion I have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the one face lotion I have been using on my dry, sensitive face for the last 3-4 years. The 30 ounce jar lasts me about 6 months using twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Private K.

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This First Aid Ultra Repair Cream really works to soften my skin. It’s very silky creamy and it’s the best product i’ve tried to be rid of dry scaly skin on my legs. It works best when I exfoliate my skin in the shower prior to applying it to moist skin. I now use it on my entire body to keep my 70 year old skin looking and feeling more youthful. I’m thrilled that I’ve found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita A.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter suffers from eczema and this works great! We use it after her showers
customer_reviews.text: Found out about this product on an eczema forum. My daughter suffers from eczema and this works great! We use it after her showers. Amazon has it cheaper than the actual brand site.
customer_reviews.author: Konniewithakaaay

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality and a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality and a little goes a long way. Great for my trouble skin, I have psoriasis. Price is right and I use it for my little kids in winter too
customer_reviews.author: A2

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this cream about a year. The hydration is excellent and it is not greasy. Excellent on my feet and legs and my hands have never been this soft.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kittelson

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and leaves my skin feeling moisturized and revitalized!! Too thick to use on your face depending on your skin type, but it's perfect for everywhere else!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it weren’t so expensive, but it’s the best all around moisturizer for troubled skin and for th3 whole family. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: James C. James

customer_reviews.title: Actually Moisturizes as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my face but now use on my hands, arms, & neck. My hands are So dry as a bartender, not anymore. It's not oily, drys fast, & no funky smell. My skin glows!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great lotion
customer_reviews.text: this product may be a little expensive but it is well worth it I got it as a gift for Christmas and I love it

customer_reviews.title: Still trying but satisfied so far
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rich cream. Feels good but too early to tell

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream/Lotion for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only cream/lotion that my husband can use. We love it

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This exceptional cream works wonders! After having undergone radiation therapy my skin was a mess and the only thing that healed it was this ultra healing cream.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super great stuff. I like using it on my face. It is expensive but if you only use it on your face it is a bargain. Kind of a souffle type of texture.

customer_reviews.title: NOT cream
customer_reviews.text: The consistency of this is kind of soupy - a jar of runny lotion. It is definitely not a “cream”. CREAM = not drippy.

customer_reviews.title: Effective Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent moisturizing cream. Thick texture seeps into skin quickly and effect lasts a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this stuff she suffered from itchy skin this cream works to take itch away

customer_reviews.title: Rub Me Down!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lotion. I need it to be THICK and moisturizing, and this does the trick while still absorbing well!

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Unscented, goes on smooth, and doesn't leave a greasey residue (although it left my skin feeling sticky). That's the only positive things I have to say. I have eczema and this didn't help nor relieve any discomfort/itching. Felt like I wasted my money. I really wanted to like it because of all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: kevin b moore

customer_reviews.title: i can go a good 3+ hours on one heavily saturated application
customer_reviews.text: a fave product of mine. it's the only product i've tried that helps moisturize my difficult-to-soften eczema. i can go a good 3+ hours on one heavily saturated application.

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It calms itchy skin and it very moisturizing. Also great on sunburn skin. I buy the unscented.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but best winter lotion I've used for my body and face. Not greasy at all. Almost no smell. Already recommended it to a friend.

customer_reviews.title: This is a multi-purpose cream and a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream, I use it for both my face and body. Blends easily and is'nt greasy when applied.

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the only moisturizer I use now. It actually soaks into your skin rather than sitting on it

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for dry skin-and I have tried them all
customer_reviews.text: Best cream ever!! Have such dry skin and this just soaks in without being greasy— the light scent is a total bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended 200%
customer_reviews.text: My kid has ezcema and only this cream works. I had tried a tons and nothing works. Recommended 200%

customer_reviews.title: Good for chapped , winter skin.

customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this cream for months and don’t plan to use anything else.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this cream from QVC, but the larger size was too expensive the next time I needed more. This price was reasonable. My dad LOVES this cream, great on his diabetic skin.

customer_reviews.text: Best hand cream EVER! My hands are in better shape than they have ever been. Love it! Only con is that it is expensive.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent cream for my body, I am 67 with very nice skin. This cream moisturizes very dry skin, it is non-greasy,, odorless. This is my third jar. Shipment was quick.

customer_reviews.title: The best cream I have ever used.

customer_reviews.text: Great for eczema and as a face moisturizer. I don't think i'll use anything else but this product for my face.

customer_reviews.title: Smells greats & feels wonderful on skin
customer_reviews.text: Smells greats & feels wonderful on skin. It has really helped my dry skin. Eczema is not a fun thing to deal with, but this cream treats it well.

customer_reviews.title: EXpensive but worth the cost.  Less expensive on other sites.

customer_reviews.title: My feet and legs have never been better.
customer_reviews.text: This has done wonders with my sign. My feet and legs have never been better.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lotion! Not slimy and doesn’t get a slime ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lotion! Not slimy and doesn’t get a slime on your head gone after you use it. Need it in gallon jugs! Would like to see it offered in the mint scent
customer_reviews.author: Ashli C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this big container for my GF when she ran out. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Publishing Professional

customer_reviews.title: Loving my feet again!!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with rough, dry, chapped, skin, or feet that have cracked from the weather or just plain dryness, this is the healing cream for you. I do love my Ultra Repair cream. I am on my 3rd or 4th jar now and have upsized to the biggy jar. We really love this lotion potion. Gets my feet in motion. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gripedoll Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product, my daughter recommended this to me and ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 100 stars or more!!!! This is an amazing product, my daughter recommended this to me and so glad I bought it,my hands look younger, they are smooth and soft and not only that I had and injury on a couple fingers and once the stitches were out I believe this repair cream healed my stitches and reduced my scarring. Seriously wish I had in a 55 gallon drum for all over body use. I am going to start using everywhere now, including my face and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit smells wonderful, excellent product for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This was in my cart while I decided whether or not to try it dt the expense. Well, it’s worth the money in my opinion. A little goes a long way and the scent (grapefruit)is plain wonderful. I’m very sensitive to perfumes and it does make my nose itch. My face was so dry, I used it on my T and found that out. I’m not new to using First Aid, I have used there face products for years, they are great in my opinion. I have rosacea and thru trial and error found First Aid. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: scottierazor

customer_reviews.title: Soft as silk
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is like rubbing silk into your skin. So wonderful. My daughters very sensitive skin did not have any reactions and my my very sensitive nose did not notice any smells. Great lotion!
customer_reviews.author: renee baylard

customer_reviews.title: This product is my favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the Ultra Repair Cream. I have used it in numerous scents. It is very effective. It stays on after several hand washings. It does NOT set off my allergies like most creams. The scents are pleasant, but not too strong. This particular scent is my favorite. It is light and refreshing, and sweet smelling. It is much like the smell of grapefruit candy. This 12 ounce size is the most cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Calliopia

customer_reviews.title: Fine to use for the body
customer_reviews.text: I do like how light and moisturizing this is. However, I realized it didn’t say it was non-comodogenic, despite saying it’s safe to use on the face, too... so I wrote to the company to ask and they said it hasn’t been tested to determine whether it is non-comodogenic or not. So I now use it as hand/body lotion, in which case it is way too expensive. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have dermatitis on face and recently my prescription cream shot up to $70 a tube! I wasn't having that, so I tried every cream on the market but this is the only one that helped. It keeps my skin moisturized and safe for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face soft without feeling greasy
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night before bed for a facial/neck cream. It absorbs nicely into my skin without ever feeling greasy. It's never leaves a mark on my pillow and my skin still feels hydrated in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Awesomesauce

customer_reviews.title: One application and skin stays hydrated all day
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cream for several years now and it is the best I have ever used. I apply it on damp skin after a shower and it lasts all day. Skin stays soft and hydrated. Won’t be without this cream!
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Always an important part of my skin care
customer_reviews.text: Being a true Cali woman, I buy all kinds of expensive face stuff. :) But sometimes, you just need a good, reasonably priced moisturizer that just does a darn good job keeping your face soft and flake-free, especially during the winter. This product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: promobabe

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry sensitive skin and this cream is my favorite! Clean smell, kinda like a soap w/o perfume. My face has flaked with some very expensive creams but no problems at work FAB.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S. Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream is amazing for my son's eczema. We haven't found anything that works as well and heals his skin and make some stop itching as of this cream. He's had bad eczema since he was born and we've tried everything and this is the only thing that's work. It is expensive but if you calculate all the creams that we've wasted money on trying to heal his skin it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kyazia

customer_reviews.title: Just an okay moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Don't care for this; I found it to be more of a body cream than anything for the face. A bit heavy and no dewy supple looking skin! Quite pricey for "just okay".
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizing with no odor
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightness of the cream and how quickly it is absorbed into the skin. It makes my skin feel wonderful. I found out about the product when my daughter had a sample from our dermatologist. I immediately bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Glasberg

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cream for years on my feet, and hands. Most importantly, it is THE BEST for dry skin, leaves skin smooth, and is not sticky or greasy when applied. After tying a multitude of other dry skin products, I found this one is superior to all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second big jar. My skin is very sensitive and this cream works great not clogging pores or developing any reactions. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana Boland

customer_reviews.title: Super sentive skin and this never bothers me
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lotion I will use! Super sentive skin and this never bothers me. It is also the only lotion that helps keep my eczema under control
customer_reviews.author: Aurora L Mintz

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing cream
customer_reviews.text: Glides on smoothly and is absorbed rapidly, conditioning and moisturizing dry itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Charvee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: really works well. Absorbs into the skin right away and lasts a long time..
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very moist but not greasy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cream I have used for my severe dry itchy skin !!!! It is thin and not oily! It sinks right into your skin without a film!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Scelzi Pataffi

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: So sad they are cancelling this scent. It is my absolute favorite cream for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this product. It has helped w/dry skin and irritations w/bug bites. If your unsure, try the sample kit and and I guarantee, you will be back for the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for a combination of different skin types. I have rosacea and this cream keeps my skin moist without causing breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: But I've heard people love it so I may be an odd case
customer_reviews.text: It just didn't work for me. I have really dry skin and it wasn't moisturizing enough for me. But I've heard people love it so I may be an odd case. I also got hives all over after using it on my face and neck which may also be not common, I'm assuming.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: The best lotion for hives and eczema
customer_reviews.text: Had terrible hives/eczema everywhere and nothing was helping. My daughter recommended this lotion and within a month all my hives and eczema were gone. I had immediate relief however within a day of use. Now I have sold my son on this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I have used many face moisturizers in the past but I have stuck First Aids Ultra Moisture for the last 5 years. I love it and the value for this caliber of cream is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but not horrible either
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much at all for my extremely dry skin. I also suffer from exyma and psorasis. It goes on nicely....but just doesn't have enough strength to moisturize my skin
customer_reviews.author: big fan of castle

product_meta.title: First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Cream: Vegan and Gluten-Free Intense Moisturizer for Dry Sensitive Skin. Perfect for Skin Conditions and Eczema. Pink Grapefruit (14 ounce)
feature_bullets: HEAD-TO-TOE: Head-to-toe moisturizer that provides instant relief and long-term hydration for dry, distressed skin, even eczema. The beautiful, whipped texture is instantly absorbed with no greasy after-feel. Grapefruit has a bright citrus fruit scent that is fresh, juicy and sparkling.

CLINICALLY PROVEN: Formulated with Colloidal Oatmeal, Shea Butter, Ceramide 3 and the FAB Antioxidant Booster, it provides immediate relief and visible improvement for parched skin and it is clinically proven to increase hydration by 169% immediately upon application.

SAFE FOR THE FAMILY: Suitable for all skin types, especially dry, flakey skin, this hydration wonder leaves skin feeling smooth, hydrated and comfortable after just a single use. Safe for sensitive skin, the cream can be used by all members of the family, even children and babies.

ABSOLUTELY NO: Alcohol, Artificial Colorants, Artificial Fragrance, Lanolin, Mineral Oil, Parabens, Petrolatum, Phthalates, Propylene Glycol, Sulfates, Talc, Formaldehydes, Oxybenzone, Coal Tar, Hydroquinone, Triclocarbon, Ethanol, Ethyl Alcohol, Denatured Alcohol, Methanol, N-Butyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Alcohol, SD Alcohol
Allergy-Tested, Gluten-Free, Nut-Free, Soy-Free, Suitable for Sensitive Skin, Vegan, Nano-Free
